game good community bad. I'd rather spend a year in prison than a day with a random from matchmaking. US servers don't have this problem but in the EU...communication is sometimes non-existant because russians,turkish polish people are too lazy to learn mf english even tho I'm pretty sure it's mandatory in schools everywhere. Unreal amount of cheaters are ruining the game but with every anti-cheat update i feel like it's getting better so the only problem that remains is the people buying accounts and tryhard smurfing but thats something i can deal with i guess. The game in itself has very few mistakes. If they fix molotovs and smokes it's a done deal.
